She mostly hangout with her friend Iris, Iris knew about Bianca's gas problem, but she didn't want to upset her.

One day Iris and Bianca were traveling through a forest, Iris got a little concern wondering if they were lost. "Um Bianca, are you sure we are going to the right way." said Iris, a bit concern. "Oh Iris, you worried too much. Of course we are going the right way, I heard this place is full of super rare and cute Pokémon" said Bianca. "Yeah, that actually does so pretty neat. I wonder what type of Pokémon we would meet" said Iris with a smile. Bianca giggled and said "I know, I'm so super excited! Why I could....." Bianca was cut off when she accidentally farted loudly, it echoed through the forest. "Just fart?" chuckled Iris. Bianca giggled as she blushed "Tee hee, excuse me." apologized Bianca. "At least it didn't stink. Try holding it in next time." said Iris. “I’ll try.” Said Bianca as she tries holding in her gas. But it seems Bianca couldn’t hold in her gas very well, so she just let it all out. The only bad thing was that it stunk badly. “Ugh Bianca, that smells awful.” Complained Iris as she covered her nose. “Sorry Iris, I can’t help it. You know what those bean burritos do to me.” said Bianca. “Personally, I think you eat too much of that stuff.” Muttered Iris as she hold her breath.

A while later as they were walking, the duo spotted a bush rustling. “Hey, what that over there.” Said Iris. “Is it a Pokémon?” asked Bianca. “I’m not sure.” Said Iris.
Soon, the mysterious thing came out of the bush. It turns out to be a Pokémon.

But which Pokémon?

Another 3 minutes, Bianca wasn’t having luck at catching Lopunny. “Quit dodging my attacks. It’s not fair.” Cried Bianca. Bianca noticed that her Emboar was getting tired as she felt bad for it. “Oh, my poor Emboar. He must be exhausted.” Suddenly, Bianca’s stomach growled slightly. Bianca smirked as she knew what it was exactly, she said to herself. “I think it’s time to make this battle a little more interesting…. and a little stinky. Bianca bends down slightly with her butt aiming high in the air.
